basics.description: Template for creating an Azure Resource Group for hosting a solution. It creates Resource Groups, diagnostic Storage Account and Azure Key Vault. It also generates all the required tags and names.

location.label: Location
location.toolTip: Location of the Resource Groups and basic resources.

options.text: Enter all necessary details about the application.

elements.name: ApplicationName
elements.label: Application Name
elements.toolTip: Please enter the application name. It has to be between 4 and 8 letters.

constraints.validationMessage: Name must be between 4-8 characters in length. Special characters are not allowed.

elements.name: IndexSuffix
elements.label: Index/Suffix
elements.toolTip: Please enter the Index or Suffix. It has to be between 2 and 4 letters.

constraints.validationMessage: Value must be between 2-4 characters in length. Special characters are not allowed.

elements.name: CountrySITSIO
elements.label: Country
elements.toolTip: The country for which the solution is provided. MSF IO and SITS is within the list as well.

allowedValues.label: Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of
allowedValues.value: Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of

allowedValues.label: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
allowedValues.value: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

elements.name: TagCustomer
elements.label: Tag Customer
elements.toolTip: Name of the customer asking for the application. This should be your main contact for current and future communication.

elements.name: TagAdministrator
elements.label: Tag Administrator
elements.toolTip: Name of the administrator responsible for the solution.

elements.name: Tagdescription
elements.label: Tag Description
elements.toolTip: A description of the application, what is for and how it is used.

constraints.validationMessage: The description must be between 21-512 characters in length.

options.text: A Storage Account for storing diagnostics and log data will provisioned for you. This account is not intended for application data. Create additional Storage Accounts as needed later.

elements.name: StorageKind
elements.label: Storage Kind
elements.toolTip: The default are just fine. Change it only in case you need some special features.

elements.name: StorageSku
elements.label: Storage Sku
elements.toolTip: The default are just fine. Change it only in case you need some special features.
